text: â€˜Yara tadera dinake khela-tamasarupe grahana karechila. Ara duniyara jibana yaderake pratarita karechila. Kaje'i aja amara taderake (jahanname) chere rakhaba, yemanibhabe tara tadera e dinera saksatera jan'ya kaja kara chere diyechila [1], ara (yemana) tara amadera ayatasamuha asbikara karechila
